effect.name: Scale3x
effect.description: Upscale the screen to a higher resolution using a Scale3x upscaling algorithm variant created for high efficiency as a shader. Special thanks to Salamanderpants for sponsorship.
effect.author: Sebastian Janisz

parameter.name: Subpixel offset X
parameter.description: Number of third-pixels to offset the output's X by.

parameter.name: Subpixel offset Y
parameter.description: Number of third-pixels to offset the output's Y by.
